generated_description:
Tejas AI is a promising fintech startup based in Mumbai, India. Founded in 2025 and already a part of Y Combinator’s Batch W25, the company aims to revolutionize how Indian banks approach risk decisioning. Their mission is straightforward yet powerful: eliminate uncertainty in credit decision-making by providing a robust platform that enables faster and more effective evaluation of credit rules.

At its core, Tejas AI focuses on building an AI-powered risk decisioning platform tailored for banks, allowing them to optimize strategies, streamline workflows, and confidently navigate complex risk landscapes. The platform offers features like intelligent policy analysis that identifies gaps in existing practices, hyperlocal actionable insights drawn from local market data, and scalability that adapts to diverse regional regulations.

Despite being a small team of just two employees, the ambition is huge. Their technology claims impressive operational efficiency: 90% faster policy updates, a 60% reduction in costs, and a staggering 99.9% accuracy rate for policy monitoring available around the clock.

For anyone interested in modernizing their underwriting processes, Tejas AI positions itself as a transformative solution that can help financial institutions implement policies within minutes rather than months. If you're a bank looking to embrace the next generation of decision-making, Tejas AI is definitely worth a closer look.

To learn more about Tejas AI and explore their offerings, check out their website at [Tejas AI](https://www.trytejas.ai). And if you’re curious enough to see how the platform works, they offer a demo to showcase its capabilities in real-time.
